definition: a pottery figurine buried with the dead
wooden figures buried with the dead

sentences.english: The terracotta figures are life-like and life-sized.
sentences.chinese: 陶俑形象逼真，与原物一样大小。

sentences.english: Terracotta models or real sea faring ones ?
sentences.chinese: 陶俑模型还是真正的航海船只？

sentences.english: Another 2 colored terra-cotta figures and a colorful lacquer wood ring were dug out at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 同时，还发现了两尊彩绘陶俑和彩色漆木环。

definition: wooden figures buried with the dead
to dig up/to appear in an excavation/unearthed/to come up out of the ground
bronze implement/refers to ancient bronze artifacts, from c. 2,000 BC
pit with funerary figures/pit containing terracotta warriors
funerary objects (items buried together with the dead)
figurines of warriors and horses buried with the dead/Terracotta Army (historic site)
musical instrument consisting of a set of chime stones suspended from a beam and struck as a xylophone
